original_text: Some of the younger widows have already turned away from Christ, so that they can obey Satan.

sentences.original_text: Some of the younger widows have already turned away from Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 어린 과부 중 일부는 이미 그리스도를 떠났습니다

sentences.original_text: so that they can obey Satan
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 사탄을 순종할 수 있습니다
